actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to apply to married individuals filing separate returns the income tax rates applicable to unmarried individuals, and for other purposes.
short_title: Married Individuals Income Tax Relief Act of 1978

summary.text: Married Individuals Income Tax Relief Act of 1978 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to tax income of married individuals filing tax returns separate from their spouses at the same rates applicable to unmarried individuals.

titles.title: Married Individuals Income Tax Relief Act of 1978
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to apply to married individuals filing separate returns the income tax rates applicable to unmarried individuals, and for other purposes.
